name: Spirit Desperate
description:
Despair is upon us!

One day, you and your fellow spirits are attacked by monsters of darkness.
Your best bet for survival,
is to sacrifice your friends,
and throw them as Spirit Bombs towards the monsters

Controls (Default):
Move: WASD
Melee Attack: LMB
Ranged Attack: RMB (Unlocked after clearing the 3rd level)

Game created for Ludum Dare 43 Compo.
